title: Guitar Hero 2:  Avenged Sevenfold Edition A7X
description:
This torrent contains an ISO image of a custom Guitar Hero disc for the PlayStation 2.  Before anyone asks, YES, YOU DO NEED EITHER A MODDED PS2 OR SWAP MAGIC VERSION 3.6 TO PLAY THIS.  Just burn the ISO file to a DVD-R disc using a program like DVD Decrypter or ImgBurn.  In this game, songs, loading tips, many text files, many images, 1 guitar, 1 drum set, background music in menus, and many other things have been customized.
